  • Method Details

    • initialise

      public void initialise()
      This is run when the game starts and is only called once. Here you'll create any required objects and load any resources needed for your game. After the initialise method is finished, the update, interpolate and render methods are called continuously until the game ends.
      Specified by:
      initialise in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer

    • update

      public void update​(float delta)
      This is where your game will apply game logic, update animations, change background music, etc.
      Specified by:
      update in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      Parameters:
      delta - The variable called 'delta' is provided and represents the amount of time in seconds to advance game logic. By default delta is 0.1 seconds.

    • interpolate

      public void interpolate​(float alpha)
      This is where your game calculates the render coordinates of your sprites.
      Specified by:
      interpolate in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      Parameters:
      alpha - The variable 'alpha' will be between 0.0 and 1.0, representing how much of an update to simulate, i.e. 0.5 means it is halfway through an update.

    • render

      public void render​(org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Graphics g)
      This is where you'll draw you game to the screen.
      Specified by:
      render in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      Parameters:
      g - Provided by mini2Dx. Common interface to graphics rendering functionality.

    • resize

      public void resize​(int width, int height)
      This method gets called every time the game window is resized.
      Overrides:
      resize in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      Parameters:
      width - The new window width. This value is provided automatically
      height - The new window height. This value is provided automatically.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      This method is called when the game is closed.
      Overrides:
      dispose in class org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
